text: @realDonaldTrump Don't tell me that All the PEOPLE who recently exposed themselves on the streets will be SPARED from COVID-19 threats while more than 100 deaths have been reported in the USA. If that is right, then PROTEST/LOOTINGS kill COVID-19.
